title: Pixel 5 - Gap between screen and body
content:
Was wondering if someone could take a look at this.

There seems to be quite a lot of units popping up where there's a gap between the display and the frame/body. 

https://forum.xda-developers.com/pixel-5/help/assembly-problem-gap-screen-case-t4177669

 I'm not the owner of the above thread but I do have the issue. 

Can someone from Google clarify the issue.

Is this normal?
Does this cause issues with waterproofing?
How/why has this happened on a Â£600 device?
